text: Just out of curiosity, is there a reason you wouldnt want to re-purpose the blog functionality for a press release area?

<@U2H3TT8F2> I thought about it. I suppose I could. The reason I guess I thought it was a little overkill is that the items link to the press piece itself, not a post. so it actuality there is no post content
Thanks for sending the link to the code gallery too. Not sure how I missed it but I didn't know it was a thing

It's new <@UEC65BQV8> - we quietly released Code Gallery into the wild. It's still in beta, still collecting submissions.
So most folks haven't heard of it (yet). :upside_down_face: Please contributing to it in mind as you build things. Together we will grow better, together! :slightly_smiling_face:
